md:
giải nghĩa từ "recruitment" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan
Recruitment /rɪˈkruːtmənt/ (noun)
- Tuyển dụng (từ loại: danh từ)
- Meaning: The process of finding and selecting people to work for an organization.
- Example: The company is currently undergoing a recruitment drive to fill several vacant positions.
- Related words: recruit, recruiter, hiring, employment, job seeker.

Note: Recruitment can also refer to the act of enlisting people to join a particular cause or organization, such as a military recruitment campaign.

Note: Recruitment can also refer to the act of enlisting people to join a particular cause or organization, such as a military recruitment campaign.
